plot outline: A Love Story - a simple unconventional love story - story of operating ancestral business. A Story of 'Siddharth' (Umesh Kamat) and 'Revati' (Sharvani Pillaai) fortifying their spice company to the next level. A Story of expressed and unexpressed relationship between 'Kiran' (Tejashri Pradhan) and 'Kirit' (Chirag Patil). A Story adorned of 'Anirudha' (Ajit Bhure) and 'Renuka' (Kavita Lad Medhekar) . Story of camaraderie and reliance between 'Tejas' (Nikhil Rajeshirke) and 'Siddharth'. A Story of brother - sister fondle between 'Siddharth' and 'Revati'
title: Asehi Ekada Vhave
